HAPPY TEACHER APPRECIATION DAY! BCMS Teachers, thank you for the lasting contribution you make
in the lives of our students.
You are examples.
You are mentors.
You are caregivers.
You are inspirers.
You are leaders.
You are supporters.
You are life changers.
You are teachers!

post_text: Thank you State Police Sergeant Wheeles for locating and returning a missing BCMS library book!! The library book had escaped the custody of one of our BCMS students and was found in the middle of Bridge Street. For the safe return of BCMS reading materials, he has our thanks! 👍🏼

post_text: It was a pleasure to greet the Class of 2026 at last evening’s 6th grade orientation! This reminder that the school is open 8AM-4PM Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday to find classrooms, practice locker combinations, pay book rental, and/or make a lunch account deposit.
